definition: having successive letter joined together, rapid handwriting in which letters are set down in full and are cursively connected within words without lifting the writing implement from the paper
details:
adjective
- having successive letter joined together
= example: having successive letter joined together
noun
- rapid handwriting in which letters are set down in full and are cursively connected within words without lifting the writing implement from the paper
= synonyms: longhand, running hand, cursive script
